name: Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge
name_original: Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge
description: Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy's Edge is an action-adventure experience where you’ll travel to the planet Batuu and get caught up in your own unforgettable story. You’ll fight alongside classic characters like R2-D2 and C-3PO (Anthony Daniels), and face intimidating villains, like Guavian Death Gang cell leader Tara Rashin (Debra Wilson). Visit Seezelslak (Bobby Moynihan) in his cantina to pick up missions that will take you into the wilds of Batuu — or become part of an all-new tale alongside Jedi Master Yoda (Frank Oz) himself.
